content.en: Fluidized bed simulations: Researchers have been exploring various algorithms to efficiently simulate and study gas-solid flow in fluidized beds. These algorithms, such as the p-ε algorithm, the CPFD model, and the coupled methods with smoothed particle hydrodynamics and finite volume method, are used to accurately simulate particle dynamics, analyze gas-flow distribution, improve drag models, and investigate particles segregation phenomenon. By integrating different computational techniques, these algorithms provide valuable insights into the behavior of fluidized beds and help optimize their design and operation.
content.da: Simulationer af fluidiseret seng: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige algoritmer for effektivt at simulere og studere gas-fast stof-strømning i fluidiserede senge. Disse algoritmer, såsom p-ε-algoritmen, CPFD-modellen og de koblede metoder med udglattet partikelhydrodynamik og finit volumen-metode, bruges til præcist at simulere partikelbevægelser, analysere gasstrømningsfordeling, forbedre modstandmodeller og undersøge partikeladskillelse. Ved at integrere forskellige beregningsteknikker giver disse algoritmer værdifuld indsigt i adfærden af fluidiserede senge og hjælper med at optimere deres design og drift.
